description: Python code using eval() on unsanitized user input - a major security vulnerability

expected_violations.message: Code uses eval() which can execute arbitrary code
Code accepts unsanitized user input for code execution

notes: This example demonstrates dangerous code patterns. Using eval() on user input is a serious security vulnerability that can lead to arbitrary code execution. The code should use safer alternatives like ast.literal_eval() for parsing literals, or avoid dynamic code execution entirely.
